images.description: with Cambridge and the MIT Green Building (designed by I.M. Pei) in the background
images.title: People lying on the esplanade

images.description: A beautiful day along the Charles River Esplanade.  The MIT Great Dome can be seen in the background, along with a pretty construction crane.
images.title: Charles River and MIT Great Dome

images.description: This picture was taken from the Cambridge side of the Charles River.  You can see the city of Boston in the background.
images.title: Naked Sailboats in the Sunset

images.description: MIT campus and sailboats in the background.
images.title: Man sitting on bench - Charles River Esplanade

images.description: Look at how green it is in the springtime!
images.title: Benches on the Charles River Esplanade

images.description: Beyond the Charles River, there is Cambridge on the left, Boston on the right, and the Longfellow Bridge connecting the two in the center.
images.title: Biker on Esplanade Platform

images.description: John Hancock Building on the left and Prudential Tower on the right
images.title: Esplanade with Boston in the Background

images.description: The Boston Marathon is a great excuse for people to get drunk during the daytime ('cause nobody has to go to work on Patriots' Day weekend), so the Captain does his part to help.
images.title: Captain Morgan at the Boston Marathon

images.description: Lots of these folks are probably drunk ...
images.title: People on Boylston Watching Boston Marathon

images.description: Check out the Matrix-looking guy next to the TV camera stand.  Of course, my favorite building, the John Hancock Tower in the background, as well as flags of many countries lining the street near the finish line.
images.title: Near the Boston Marathon Finish Line

images.description: About 1 mile left until the finish.  People running near the Citgo sign in Boston.
images.title: 1 Mile from Boston Marathon Finish Line

images.description: About 1 mile left until the finish.  People running near the Citgo sign in Boston.  Some are so pooped by this time that they are walking.
images.title: Boston Marathon Runners

images.description: About 1 mile left until the finish.  John Hancock and Prudential towers in the distant background.
images.title: Boston Marathon Runners (again)

images.description: I snapped this candid shot of a boy playing with pigeons when I was walking through Boston Common.
images.title: Motion Commotion

images.description: A beautiful day in the Boston Common park.
A lazy weekend day.
images.title: Lying Around in Boston Common

images.description: He could be a hobo, but maybe not.  He's got dirty socks, though.
images.title: Jesus-like guy in Boston common

images.description: A little girl lined up with a mother duck and her ducklings in Boston Common.
images.title: Duck, Duck, Duck ...

images.description: This is the funniest picture ever!  An entire wedding party is being photographed in the Boston Public Garden right in front of this sign!
images.title: Please Stay off the Grass!

images.description: in the Boston Public Garden
images.title: Flowers and George Washington Monument

images.description: in the Boston Public Garden
images.title: Flowers and George Washington Monument (vertical)

images.description: Some historic buildings in the Beacon Hill neighborhood (really rich!)
images.title: Quaint Boston neighborhood

images.description: Typical homes in the Beacon Hill neighborhood (really rich!)
images.title: Beacon Hill Real Estate

images.description: It's so amazing how the streets in the Beacon Hill neighborhood of Boston are so darn quiet, when there is a bustling city just a few blocks nearby.
images.title: Beacon Hill Street

images.description: Selling trinkets and stuff from his van parked in Chinatown.
images.title: Chinatown Van Vendor

images.description: Home of fancy restaurants, specialty stores, and rich people.
images.title: Ultra-Posh Newbury Street

images.description: Some dude is taking a nap with his mouth wide open on the steps of the Boston Public Library.
images.title: Mouth Agape at the Boston Public Library

images.description: Kids skateboarding near the historic Trinity Church in Copley Square
images.title: Skateboarders at Trinity Church

images.description: The historic Trinity Church and the modern John Hancock building in Copley Square
images.title: Old and New Juxtaposition

images.description: Self-explanatory
images.title: John Hancock Towering Over Copley Square

images.description: The names of several famous scientists are engraved in stone at the entrance of the Boston Public Library
images.title: Science Pimps at Boston Public Library

images.description: Some menacing-looking statue in Copley Square right next to the Trinity Church
images.title: Huge Preacher Duo

images.description: This is crazy!  There's a freaking restaurant in front of the Emporio Armani store on Newbury Street
images.title: Shopping and Dining at Armani

images.description: I think these are gnomes.  Just hangin' out on the steps in front of a shop on Newbury Street.
images.title: Gnomes! Gnomes!

images.description: Hanging out on the Charles right near the Harvard (Mass. Ave.) bridge.  The Esplanade and Longfellow Bridge can be seen in the distant background.
images.title: Boat on the Charles River

images.description: A view of Cambridge and part of the MIT campus taken from the Boston side of the Charles River at sunset. (Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Sunset over Cambridge

images.description: A snowy winter sunset over Boston taken from my Cambridge apartment. (Boston, MA)
images.title: Snowy Sunset over Boston

images.description: This was taken on Memorial Drive right along the Charles River. I really like the amazing sunrise colors and the entire city in silhouette. The white streak on the left side was made by the headlights of an incoming car. (Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Sunrise over Boston

images.description: The John Hancock building is on the left and the Prudential building is on the right. Notice the full moon next to the Prudential. (Boston, MA)
images.title: Full moon sunset

images.description: The John Hancock building has a vertical groove that reflects the sunset in a golden red glow. Notice the really red area at the base of the building (on the left side). (Boston, MA)
images.title: Glowing beam of light

images.description: The beautiful Back Bay region of Boston at night with the Charles River in the middle and Memorial Drive in Cambridge in the foreground. (Boston, MA)
images.title: Nighttime on the Charles River

images.description: Selected lights were turned on in the Prudential Building to cheer on the Boston Red Sox baseball team as they competed for the ALCS title. They ended up losing to the Yankees that year, but won in the following year in an amazing series. (Boston, MA)
images.title: Cheering for the Red Sox

images.description: This picture was taken in the courtyard of my apartment building after a big snow storm. (Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Snowy courtyard

images.description: The Boston Celtics play the Indiana Pacers in the NBA playoffs in the Fleet Center. (Boston, MA)
images.title: Celtics game at the Fleet Center

images.description: The MacGregor House kids play some volleyball on Thompson Island (a few minutes from Boston by boat) during our annual dorm clambake. (Thompson Island - Boston, MA)
images.title: Island Volleyball Action

images.description: A subway performer plays the guitar and sings in the Government Center station (Boston, MA)
images.title: Subway Musician

images.description: An anti-Bush protester plays music and hands out flyers to protest the administration and the war in Iraq. (Harvard Square - Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Anti-Bush protester

images.description: A vocal Christian warns the world of the consequences of not being Christian. A bald man with an impressive mustache chats with that guy. (Harvard Square - Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Hardcore Christian in Harvard Square

images.description: A street performer gets audience members to tie him up and then escapes from the ropes (Harvard Square - Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Escape Artist in Harvard Square

images.description: A really old cemetary with tombstones dating from the 1600's. (Harvard Square - Cambridge, MA)
images.title: Really old cemetary

images.description: We went near Boston's Logan airport one day because my friends wanted to photograph airplanes landing. While they were doing that, I photographed them photographing airplanes landing. Yep, I'm weird. (Boston, MA)
images.title: Man and Plane

images.description: in downtown Boston.  Live music, beer (Guiness!), and middle-aged men.  Mmmm
images.title: Music at the Black Rose Pub

images.description: The beers that Kevin and I downed are chillin' on the table having a good time listening to music.
images.title: Beers Enjoying Live Pub Music
